Title: VideoClubGorbea Online Video Renting -Reference Project-
Description: VideoClubGorbea it's a reference project, based on a imaginary online video renting shop in wich you will learn  how to make the solution arquitecture, how to separete in n-layers, using the latest technology and design patterns such: .net 4.5, c#, MVC 4, async ctp, parallel task library, MVVM, Entity Framework Code First, Metro style app... and much more!
HomeWiki:
This Project it’s for educational purpose. This is a sample that covers every development step in a full .NET project, from the arquitecture, Project división to design patterns… Because of that, i tried to make an easy to understand Project about internet movie renting shop with this requeriments and technologies you will learn about:

Technologies

  • c#
  • .NET 4.5
  • WCF
  • Metro + WinRT
  • Async CTP
  • ParallelTaskLibrary
  • MVC 4 Asp.net
  • EntityFramework 4 Code First
  • Moq
  • Unity
  • HTML5
  • Reactive Extensions

Desing patterns

  • MVVM
  • Separation of concerns
  • Interface Segregation
  • Unit Testing
  • IOC
  • SOLID

By Fernando Urkijo Cereceda
TagList: .NET 4.5,Code First,Metro UI,C#,async ctp,MVVM,Unit of Work,Arquitectura,HTML5,Arquitecture,Entity Framework,MVC,videoclub,videoclub gorbea,video club gorbea,videoclubgorbea,reactive extensions,Metro,
